page.title: 03Lawhitton a village study
page.content: Lawhitton is a fairly small village. It consists of 40 bungalows and 15 houses. There are 2 estates of bungalows called Holman's Meadow and St Michaels Close. The latter consists of 30 bungalows which were built in the late 1960's. Each one has a garage and a small garden. Holman's Meadow has 10 bungalows built around the same time as the other estate. The road running through Lawhitton has 17th and 18th century houses alongside it.There are 4 semi detached houses, 4 terraced houses and 9 detached houses. There are also 2 farms on the edge of the village called Lagleam Farm and Sheers Barton.Lawhitton has expanded and has more than doubled in the last 15 years.
